00046 class Response {
00047    private:
00048       std::string mMessage;
00049    public:
00050       Response(const wxString &response)
00051          : mMessage(response.mb_str())
00052       { }
00053 
00054       wxString GetMessage()
00055       {
00056          return wxString(mMessage.c_str(), wxConvUTF8);
00057       }
00058 };
00059 
00060 class ResponseQueue {
00061    private:
00062       std::queue<Response> mResponses;
00063       wxMutex mMutex;

00065 
00066    public:
00067       ResponseQueue();
00068       ~ResponseQueue();

00071       Response WaitAndGetResponse();
